page.title: 02Leisure in Alveston
page.content: In Alveston there are many activities going on almost every day of of the week for both young and old.Boys and girls aged between 7 and 16 there is either cubs,scouts,brownies or guides held weekly at the youth centre.There is a youth club held there also.The church holds a number of clubs such as sunday school,pathfinders and hand-bellringing for the children and for the adults church bellringing and coffee mornings,bible studies and charity lunches.For young girls there is a ballet club.In Alveston there is a cricket ground where the famous cricket player W.G. Grace used to play,it is now used by Alveston cricket club.There is also a B.M.X. track.Thornbury Sports Centre offers many more sporting activities.
